DOC.brief_summary: To assess visual performance patient low level ( 0.5-0.75 Diopters ) corneal astigmatism .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Visual Performance Patients With Low Levels Astigmatism
DOC.criteria: 5075 year age Proof eye exam within last 12 month Operated uncomplicated , agerelated cataract > 3 month Corneal astigmatism 0.50.75 diopter Previous ocular refractive surgery/trauma Clinically severe corneal dystrophy Amblyopia Degenerative visual disorder
